page.title: 12MORE ON HOUSING
page.content: INGLEGLEN-Ingleglen house used to be a plant nursery and had an orchard to help support the estate.It was sold 25 years ago. 5.Ingleglen just off the A355 is now a modern estate built on the orchard and on site of the old house.I live there,in a detached house with linked garages. Front gardens are lawned and open plan. Each year we have an "Ingleglen party" in the Brian Jubb Hall for all the residents. 6.I live in a modern detached house in Blackpond Lane called "Alamanda".The land before the house was built is said to have belonged to Dr.Barnardo Homes. 7.I live in Beeches Road in a 20 year old house which before the last owner belonged to a very famous BBC television personality. 8.Golden Oak Close,the new estate is where the old telephone exchange was.
